message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $100 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $105 for the product.
I'm still willing to negotiate, Bob. However, I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $115.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $110 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $112.50.
Considering your latest offer, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $110 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $112.00.
Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $110 for the product.
